Hook.Name: onfailure
Hook.Script: cat("****** sync process stopped on Failure ******",1);

Hook.Name: onsuccess
Hook.Script: cat("****** sync process completed ******",1);

Hook.Name: prolog
Hook.Script: cat(" ",1); cat("****** sync process started ******",1);

Hook.Name: after_getnext

AttributeMapItem.Name: racfattributes

Hook.Name: before_initialize
Hook.Script: thisConnector.connector.setParam("jndiExtraProviderParams", "com.sun.jndi.ldap.connect.timeout:60000");

AttributeMapItem.Name: systemoriginator

Hook.Name: after_getnext
default_fail

AttributeMapItem.Name: racfpassword

Hook.Name: before_execute
before_lookup
default_fail
Hook.Script: cat("ITDI0001E : ERROR : logic lookup : Sync system aborting",1); task.shutdown();

Hook.Name: lookup_ok
after_add
Hook.Script: cat( "updZVMsdbm.AfterAdd: Added " + work.getString("$dn"),2);

Hook.Name: after_modify
Hook.Script: cat( "updZVMsdbm.AfterModify: Modified " + work.getString("$dn"),2);

Hook.Name: before_add
Hook.Script: cat( "updZVMsdbm.Before_Add: Adding entry " + conn.getString("$dn"),2);

Hook.Name: before_execute
before_lookup
before_modify
default_fail
modify_nochange
Hook.Script: cat("updZVMsdbm.On_No_Changes: No updates to " + work.getString("$dn") );

Hook.Name: update_ok
Hook.Script: cat("Changenumber '"+work.getString("changenumber")+"' from system '"+work.getString("systemoriginator")+"' to system '"+current_connector+"' synchronized successfully",1);

Hook.Name: before_execute
before_lookup
default_fail
delete_ok
Hook.Script: cat("Changenumber '"+work.getString("changenumber")+"' from system '"+work.getString("systemoriginator")+"' to system '"+current_connector+"' synchronized successfully",1);

Script.name: cat
global_Prolog
